text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode
of Laura in the kitchen I'm going to
show you how to make traditional cannoli
now just keep in mind that every single
Italian household has their version of
the traditional recipe this is my
grandmother's recipe that I have been
making since I was a little girl with
her on the little stool in the kitchen
so this is all I know when it comes to
traditional cannoli but again every
household has their way of making it so
there you have it this is just my
version before we get started let's go
over the ingredients you're going to
need some cannoli shells of course some

a pinch of cinnamon vanilla extract
candied orange peel that's been finely
finely chopped and you don't need some

ricotta anywhere and it's kind of it's
it's not the ricotta that you get here
in the US because the kind of the
ricotta that I get here the supermarket
it's got a little bit too much liquid
but the problem is we can't make cannoli

own and what I've done this process
started last night I've taken some
